rules.text: FOC + [connection]: Coax [2] the lutrinals back to their lair to add 1 lure to this feature. You may discard 1 token from an equipped food to commit 1 effort.
Clear [progress]: Shuffle a Romping Lutrinal into the path deck for each lure on this feature.
Exhaust this feature. »» Search the path deck and discard for a Romping Lutrinal and put it into play.
If there is another Romping Lutrinal in play, it frolics among the reeds. »» Move it within reach.
If there is an active predator other than a Romping Lutrinal, exhaust it. »» Add [harm] equal to its presence to this being.
If there are other active Romping Lutrinals, exhaust each of them and this being. »» Suffer 1 injury.
You cannot remove your [Ranger Token] except with the following test:
FIT + [conflict]: Pull [2] yourself free of the constricting lake weed to add [harm] to this feature equal to your FIT aspect and remove your [Ranger Token] from this feature.
The Ranger with the most fatigue must discard 1 AWA or move their [Ranger Token] to this feature.
If your [Ranger Token] is on a water feature, the Naiad stabs you with its teeth. »» Suffer 1 injury.
FOC + [reason]: Wrap [2] the pungent leaves around a wound to add 1[harm] to this feature and either heal 1 injury from a Ranger, or discard 2[harm] from a being.
If there is a Romping Lutrinal within reach, it escapes through the weeds. »» Move it along the way.
FIT + [reason]: Pry open a shell and savor its contents to add 1[harm] to this being and soothe 2 fatigue.
If there is an exhausted predator, ready it. »» Exhaust this being.
If there is an active predator, exhaust it. »» Add [harm] to this being equal to that predator's presence.
SPI + [connection]: Soak [2] your feet in the cold, clear water to move your [ranger token] to this feature and soothe fatigue equal to your effort.
FOC + [exploration]: Follow [2] the cheerily winding stream to move your [Ranger Token] to this feature and add 1[progress] to the location.
